trans-unit.source: This module allows you to translate xml file for modules
trans-unit.target: 这个模块使你可以编辑扩展的XML文件

trans-unit.source: Tool used to translate locallang*.xml files inside the TYPO3 backend.
trans-unit.target: 这个工具用来编辑语言文件

trans-unit.source: Hide extensions without xml files : Hide extensions without xml files in selectbox. Warning ! If you activate this option, display may become slow.
trans-unit.target: 隐藏没有XML文件的扩展，如果没有语言文件，则不出现在选框中

trans-unit.source: Order extension by title : Show Title in first in extension list, else show extKey.
